text: Khashayar Zebarjad (; born 20 May 1995) is an Iranian football player. He has played as a midfielder for several Iranian clubs including Malavan, Esteghlal Khuzestan, Mes Kerman, Shams Azar Qazvin, and Sanat Naft Abadan. == Club Career == === Malavan F.C. === * Played over five seasons * Scored 4 goals and gave 4 assists * Played in more than half of all matches === Shahrdari Astara === * Scored 1 goal and provided 3 assists * Played in more than half of the matches === Esteghlal Khuzestan === * Helped team promote to Persian Gulf Pro League * Scored 1 goal and made 3 assists * Started in half of the matches, substituted in the rest === Mes Kerman === * Scored 8 goals and made 8 assists * Played full matches in almost every game * Named Best Player of the Season by fans === Shams Azar Qazvin === * Started in 8–9 matches, came on as a substitute in others === Sanat Naft Abadan === * Started in 8–9 matches * Helped the team compete until the final week of the season for promotion * Reached the top 4 in the Hazfi Cup (Iranian knockout cup) == Style of Play == Zabarjad plays mostly as a central or attacking midfielder. He is known for his assists, consistency, and teamwork. == Personal Life == He was born in Bandar Anzali, Iran. His height is 1.72 meters and his weight is 68 kg. == References == Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian footballers Category:People from Bandar Anzali Category:Association football midfielders Category:Malavan F.C. players Category:Esteghlal Khuzestan F.C. players Category:Mes Kerman F.C. players Category:Sanat Naft Abadan F.C. players Category:Shams Azar Qazvin F.C. players Category:Football biography stubs
title: Khashayar Zabarjad (footballer)
